title: I Didn’t Save You To Get Proposed To
summary: As usual, I was going home from work. But suddenly I had an accident. Before I left, I heard someone’s voice in my head. [I’m Elsia Artise, please save him, please, you can do it!!] That was the last thing I was aware of before fainting. After opening my eyes, I found myself in a different place… This place was in a novel that I read before that accident happened! I already possess the body of Elsia, who will die as soon as the novel begins. There’s only one thing I can do to survive. It was following Elsia’s request and distorting the original! First, it was to save Ixion, her unrequited love, who was assassinated and killed. “Prince, I am here to warn you of the assassination that will take place today.” I succeeded in saving him by using information from the original, I just want to live a comfortable life that has nothing to do with the original. Until I received a letter… “I owe you a lot of favors. I hope you will come to the capital immediately because I want to repay this favor with a marriage.” Ixion’s marriage proposal, which I thought was the end of our relationship. “Prince, I didn’t save you so you could propose to me?” Can Elsia peacefully refuse his marriage proposal and return to her comfortable life?

title: Superstar From Age 0
summary: After being reborn for the umpteenth time, 7-month-old Lee Seojun finally gets the chance to fulfill his original dream of becoming a superstar actor! Using magic abilities from his past lives, baby Seojun captivates his playmates and becomes an overnight sensation with a viral mukbang video that helps fussy kids eat. Soon, he's shooting a baby food commercial, and his uncle's entertainment company is knocking at his door... but will Seojun be able to keep up the magic to match the demand?

title: The Flower Who Bears The Sword
summary:
A young boy named Mikazuki Kenya was abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitude. At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming. A meeting with Kaguya and Reina, the heroines from the immensely popular game Knight of Giant. The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them.

However, in the story, one of them is destined to die. To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world. Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of Knight of Giant?!

title: Fatal Favoritism
Invincible Romance
Legendary Youngest Son of the Marquis House
summary:
After getting revenge on the Thulcaan Empire, Jack Valantier took his last breath. But just when he thinks it's all over, he finds himself transported back to when he was 14!

From his negligent and wicked family to his loyal servant and caring sister, it's all just as he had remembered. But this time, Jack is armed to the teeth with decades of experience from his previous life! He's ready to give them hell, and those that have wronged him will pay dearly.

Because this time, he's invincible.

title: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins
summary:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.

title: The Abandoned Bachelorette Enjoys Her Simple Life
summary:
Catherine did not want much.

Even if she did not have luxurious clothes and shoes, she was alright with her hideously frayed bedroom curtains and her shoes that were so worn at the soles it was different in height.

It had been two years since she started enduring it for the sake of her late mother.

She no longer felt the need to do that.

"Alright, I'll leave."

Catherine was tired of everything.

***

"Are you the Pope's watchdog? You've done well coming all the way here."

The man who intruded her home was drenched from head to toe.
She could see mud squished beneath his black leather boots.

Unbelievable.
To think he would drag in not grass, but mud, while she was cleaning the floors!

"You've got quite the disguise. Even I was almost fooled into thinking that you're just an ordinary city woman---"
"Wipe it."

She pushed the rag she held onto the man.

"Why are you looking at me so foolishly? I told you to wipe the floor. And it's not proper to show your sword when it's our first time meeting each other. Is it not enough that you intruded that you would want to be reported for attempted murder?"

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: The Saintess Became the Northern Grand Duke’s Daughter
summary: Born Again to Escape, and to Heal a Broken Heart Liriette, blessed with divine power that could heal others through her blood, had spent her short life as nothing more than a tool for a cruel High Priest. Her end came quietly, used and discarded. But one day, she opened her eyes… and she was 10 years old again. "This time, I will never let the horrors of my past repeat themselves." Determined to escape the clutches of the High Priest, Liriette sought refuge in the farthest corner of the empire, with none other than Duke Windsorice, the ruler of the cold and mysterious North. "I can heal your eyes. Please, let me stay by your side." At first, it was simply a desperate attempt to escape her dreadful fate. Yet, as time passed, her hopes and dreams began to grow beyond mere survival. "Would you… become my daughter?" With trembling hands and a soft voice, Liriette asked, "What would you gain from me as your daughter?" The Duke's lips curled into the faintest smile. "A kind and beautiful daughter." Follow the heartwarming journey of a lonely girl who finds her home and happiness as the beloved daughter of the empire’s coldest Duke. Watch as the once-unfeeling ruler becomes the ultimate doting father, melting the icy North with his newfound love.

title: I’m Done Being a Hero, Even If It’s Retirement
summary: Everyone's shocked when 9-year-old prodigy Adelia Ester suddenly refuses to enroll in the elite knights' academy. They don't know that Adelia was magically sent back in time after wasting her life on the battlefield and suffering an early death! Now, Adelia's out to protect her peace from her ex-boss, the evil future emperor, by setting her ally on the throne instead. Will Adelia succeed in one last mission and finally retire for good? Or will she find herself forced to be a hero once more?

title: Becoming A Family With The Duke and His Dear Son
summary: After her transmigration into the body of a villainess, Ibellia Barnein made it her first goal to call off the contractual marriage that would lead to her untimely death. Try as she might to avoid the cold duke and his son, however, they appear in front of Ibellia time and time again. Can she break her role as the evil stepmother? Or are the novel's events doomed to pass despite her best efforts?

title: Welcome to Dungeon Hotel
summary: In the Lapland region of Finland, the domain of snow, midnight sun, and auroras, there is the small Hotel Metsäpeura, run by two older gentlemen. One night during a terrible blizzard, a mysterious young man named Jun arrives at the hotel. He is clearly in dire straits, with a large tattoo on his back, no relatives and no money. However, the gentlemen warmly welcome him in and offer him a job at the hotel. The kindness of the people living in the harshness of nature will melt the heart of this awkward young man.

title: Today the Villainess has Fun Again
summary:
My friend stole my boyfriend and then dared to hand me a wedding invitation with a smile? Ha! I had a blast enjoying my revenge and came home and fell asleep but...when I woke up I was in the body of the Villainess of a Romance Fantasy novel who has everything: appearance, assets, and intelligence. The only thing this girl lacked was the insight to judge a man. Throw the bastard Prince away to the main female lead and let us just enjoy the luxury of power and money!

---
From growing up in a dysfunctional family to being cheated on, Sojin never had it easy. So after waking up in the body of villainess Reilynn Candmion, daughter of the empire’s wealthiest duke, all she wants is to revel in her riches. But something feels amiss when the story’s heroine, Iris, constantly starts fights with her — from stealing her dress to seducing her fiancé. Reilynn wants no drama, but Iris and her four love interests won’t leave her alone! Can’t a girl just wanna have fun?

title: Her Marriage Was Called Off at Daytime, the Cutely Fierce Commander Asked Her For a Hug at Night
Do Your Best and Regret
summary: No summary available.

title: Clever Cleaning Life Of The Returned Genius Hunter
summary:
World’s first SSS-ranked genius hunter, Kim Jun-woo.

He regresses ten years into the past after being ambushed by unknowns one day. With all his hunter skills now locked, he must fulfill his career as a dungeon cleaner to unlock them.

But this cleaner… is extraordinary!

The once renowned hunter, Kim Jun-woo, takes over the cleaning duty with vigorous determination.

title: Childhood Friend of the Zenith
summary:
Kazuma Suzuki was just your average high schooler—until his childhood friend, Rua Takayashiki, a beautiful, sharp-tongued girl who also happened to be the granddaughter of the school chairman and the nation’s top idol, cut all ties with him using a line straight out of a drama.

Forced into submission for years as her so-called childhood friend, Kazuma decides it’s finally time for his first-ever rebellion. He’s done playing lapdog. This time, he’s taking back his freedom—and aiming for a normal school life.

Escaping a powerful beauty like her is easier said than done...

title: The Count’s Youngest Son is A Player
summary:
Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. 

Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. 

Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

title: When Rage Turns You Into the Female Lead
I Saved You, but I’m Not Responsible
summary:
I was the one abandoned, yet I seem to have grown up the most mentally stable! 

I was ordered to serve my fake counterpart as her maid, so I decided to go undercover. But something's off with my former family. Whatever, it's not my problem! So, I just focused on my task... 

"Are you really not going to live with us?"

The eldest, who used to show obsessive control over the fake, started acting strangely toward me. 
"I never thought I’d feel such camaraderie and trust with the opposite sex. You’re strangely too comfortable." 

The second brother, who was on the brink of falling into darkness, managed to get back on track thanks to me. 
"I didn’t come here to help them film their regret-filled family drama." 

I tried to ignore everything and quickly moved on to my next mission… but why do I keep running into people whose lives are completely messed up? 

Why is everyone in perfect need of saving?

title: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later
summary:
Oh Kangwoo the Demon King has had it with ruling over Hell and wants to return to Earth. 

But when he finally gets there, not only are his powers sealed, but the Earth he once knew has turned into an MMORPG free-for-all. 

Dimensional gates have appeared all over the world, and "players" enter them to make a living by hunting monsters. If Kangwoo wants to survive in this dangerous game, he's going to have to level up, and fast. 

But for this demon king, hell on earth might be worse than Hell itself!

title: The Thousand Faces Actor
summary:
"What do you think people will end up calling him?"

Someone asked. But no one had an answer.

A transcendent being has appeared in the world.
And a new chapter in film history begins.

title: Disastrous Necromancer
summary:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer! Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges. What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/18819/)

**Official Translations:**  
- **English**: 
  - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/necromancer-the-ultimate-scourge)
  - [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/necromancer-the-ultimate-scourge!_32189339808001201)
  - [Webcomics](https://webcomicsapp.com/comic/The-Necromancer-Scourge-Incarnate/67d2567f62661d2b396f4062)
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/159311)
- [French](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/catastrophic-necromancer/list?title_no=6587)
- [Russian](https://recomics.org/manga/necromancer-i-am-the-disaster)

title: The Joseon prince went to America and didn’t return
summary: Due to a sudden natural disaster, Park Byung-jun, a Korean-American lobbyist, finds himself reincarnated as Yi Kang, the second son of Emperor Gojong of the Korean Empire, at the moment of his death. Armed with his knowledge of the original history, he crosses over to the United States and begins his own new business to amass wealth!

title: The Great Mage Returns After 4000 Years
summary:
Lucas Trowman was the greatest archmage in history until he was condemned by Demigod to spend eternity losing his mind. But 4,000 years later, he’s thrust back into this world, into the body of Frei Blake, the weakest, most un-talented student at the prestigious Westroad Academy for mages. After all this time, the world of magic has barely progressed. Could this be the work of Demigod? Determined to find out, Lucas seeks to reach the highest levels of power once again and get his revenge.

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/4000%EB%85%84-%EB%A7%8C%EC%97%90-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%ED%95%9C-%EB%8C%80%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%82%AC/2385)
- [Official Indonesian Translation (Kakao)](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kembalinya-Sang-Archmage-Setelah-4000-Tahun/3441)
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/37285)
- [Official French Translation (Delitoon)](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/retour-grand-mage)
- [Official Thai Translation (Kakao)](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87_4000_%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%B5/10)

title: LV. 99 The Princess of Dark Flare
Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Love Under the Full Moon
summary: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!

title: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Shots From the Future
summary:
The historical timeline is facing collapse, and the strongest Taoist master was sent back to one hundred thousand years ago with his entire body of cultivation. Ding~ Your system-assigned mission is here, it's up to you to entice all the female apprentices!


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/13619)
- [Official japanese (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82263)

title: My bias gets on the last train
summary:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.

title: Heart-Pounding Cute Poem
summary:
Choi Do-yeon continued to make a living as a game streamer in a rented room in Banjiha.
To his hometown senior and broadcasting senior, who helped him a lot,
You'll get a link to a game.
In front of Doyeon, who downloaded [Heart-Pounding Ghostly Poem] without thinking about it
You start to see girls who shouldn't be seen.
Panic is also momentarily timed and the virgin ghost love sim that risks her life begins.

title: Breaking the Prison
summary:
The dragon is destined to crave the lost bead of life.
Therefore, the dragon's companion is not chosen, but determined.
Emperor Isbrandt, born with the thickest dragon's blood since the beginning of the Empire.
The moment he finds Seren Lubarb among the smell of blood and screams,
Isbrandt realizes the unpleasant feeling flowing through his veins.
She is the bead of life that the dragon's blood has been longing for,
and he has been longing for this woman like crazy since before his life began.
Lovely and annoying.
Seren's body, which embraces the rampaging dragon's blood, was moist,
and she always gave off a sweet scent whenever she clung to him.
He wanted to tear the delicate woman apart like a butterfly's wing and eat her thoroughly.
He ate all her sobs and screams and filled his desire instead.
Seren Lubarb belongs to Isbrandt.
It was destined that way from the beginning.
But.
Seren betrayed him and ran away.
Even while carrying my child in my womb.

title: Black Killer Whale Baby
summary:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and this is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but the latter doesn’t recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.

---
At age 3, Calypso Aquasiadel is the most outstanding genius her family's ever seen, and no wonder... She's actually a modern girl who's been reborn into the same novel thrice! This time around, Calypso's determined to harness the powers of the mysterious dragon duke and send herself back home. The only problem is, she'll first need to earn the respect of her hardened family to survive until then! Can Calypso win their approval and even their hearts? Or is this life doomed for another do-over?

title: The Great Mage of the Hero’s Party Reincarnates
summary:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.

---
The battle with the arch-nemesis resumes after 300 years. The genius wizard, Lynn, embarks on a grand journey, at the age of 13. Together with the party of heroes, led by Esther, they aim to defeat the great evil “Abyss” that intends to throw the world into chaos. However, the battles becomes increasingly fierce and at the final moment, Lynn succumbs to the dark poison of the “Abyss”. Leaving behind the words “I’ll be back”, Lynn’s soul falls dormant for 300 years, before being resurrected into the body of a boy of noble birth. Thus begins his second life in a peaceful world. But in the meantime, a dark force is brooding once again, threatening to plunge the world into turmoil once again.

---
The warrior Lista heard the rumors about the great magician Rin, hailed as a genius for becoming the youngest 4-star mage. Lista recruited him to join her party to fight the forces of the void but, right before the final battle, Rin’s body succumbed to the void’s dark poison. As he drew his last breath, Rin cast an immortality spell, encasing his body in ice and promising Lista that he would return. Rin kept his promise and returned after 300 years--but reborn in the body of a noble boy.

title: The Sister Who Once Hated Me Now Loves Me
A Romantic Ending with My 2D Boyfriend!
summary: From flirts to mama’s boys to married men, intentionally Sun Choi keeps dating men like those. Promising to herself, not to date men like those ever again, she developed a game called ‘Dating Simulation.’ Since its release is just around the corner that she went to work even on the weekend and played the game as a developer. She plays a ‘share house version’ where you can meet various men of various classes all at once. However, she gets wakes up in the game as the female character.

title: Another Woman’s Man
summary:
Jung Eun-ae, whose life goal is to marry Jin-hong—an undeniably perfect boyfriend—and to build a family anyone would envy.

Growing weary of her boyfriend, who fails to fill her loneliness,

she finds herself drawn to her senior, Lee Jae-won,

who, despite his seemingly indifferent demeanor, is surprisingly considerate.

Despite knowing that he is a married man,

she begins to feel an attraction toward him,

and in order to have him,

she consciously—or perhaps unconsciously—starts to shatter her own moral beliefs one by one...

title: Paradise on Earth
summary:
In search of perfect love, 16 men and women participate in the dating reality program "Paradise on Earth." With sparkling blue seas and warm sunshine 365 days a year, this place is a paradise-like island.

However, in the second week of filming, the staff members infected with an unknown virus begin to show strange phenomena, and paradise turns into hell in an instant. All contact between the island and the outside world is cut off, and rescue efforts are out of reach. Will they be able to survive to the end?

title: I’ll Be The Matriarch In This Life
summary:
"Juliana, your fiancé has been decided.”
At that moment, the frail daughter of an earl awakened to a shocking truth—within her resided the soul of the infamous "Cold-Hearted Emperor" Julius. A man whose ruthless conquests left behind mountains of corpses and an empire under his iron rule. 

Now, reborn as a delicate young noble girl, Julius finds himself in a seemingly peaceful era. But beneath the surface lurk corruption, poverty, and disease, all exploited by scheming villains. With the wisdom and might of a former emperor, Juliana will not stand idly by. The young lady who once ruled as a tyrant is ready to cleanse the empire once more—this time, with her tiny hands. 

A dark yet thrilling tale of power, justice, and a battle against the hidden evils of the empire begins!

title: I Simply Cared For My Frail Dad
The Rankers Guide to Live an Ordinary Life
summary:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

---
In a world filled with towers, dungeons, and monsters, some people have awakened with special powers. While these hunters risk their lives in battle and climb the world rankings, Jio Gyeon is happy to just sit back and enjoy a simple life of leisure. But Jio has a secret—she’s the strongest hunter in the world. But when a time traveling stranger warns her of humanity’s bleak future, will Jio finally take action? And what enemies are waiting for her to reveal her true identity?

title: I’m stuck in a crazy drama
summary:
After a life of hardship as an orphan, Jia Han finally achieves the dream of homeownership... only to have her moment of jubilation cruelly cut short. While indulging in her guilty pleasure--a riveting soap opera--she experiences a sudden, piercing chest pain and meets an untimely demise. But when she wakes up, she finds herself not in the afterlife, but within the very drama she was watching and as none other than its villainess! In a realm where a glance sparks a scandal and a step triggers a landmine of emotions, what fate lies ahead for Jia?

---
The main character, who grew up as an orphan, finally achieves her dream of owning her own home after suffering.
Her joy was short-lived and she suddenly died while watching a drama she enjoyed, feeling pain in her chest. However, when she opened her eyes again, she was in a drama she had watched before she died! And that too, while possessing Shin Sera, a villain who tries to kill the female protagonist, but is destroyed by the male protagonists!

Shin Sera Loving's main character tries to escape from the drama to prevent her destruction, but there is a succession rival who hates her, a fiancé who doesn't even treat her as a human being, and a pervert with a blank face.... With a variety of male protagonists with outbursts of personality, are you getting more and more entangled?

title: The Villainess is Done Trying
summary: What would you do when you've transmigrated as the most-hated villainess in the story? In the case of Marso, she tried hard to change the storyline by performing good deeds and taking care of the female lead. However, things are not going as she had hoped for--every character in the story still hates her! It seems no matter what she does she cannot seem to change her fate. Tired of trying, Marso declares that she'll stay home and do nothing--for the rest of her life.

title: Mr. War: The Ultimate Ex-Soldier
summary:
George, a legendary special forces soldier feared by both allies and enemies, earned the nickname “Mr. War” for his unmatched combat prowess.
But betrayed by his own comrades, he met his end on the battlefield in a deadly conspiracy.

Presumed dead, he suddenly awakens in a filthy slum known as Industrial Waste Island… a lawless zone ruled by violence and exploitation.

Reborn as Michio, a powerless slave laborer, he finds himself at the bottom of society.
But with his brilliant mind and lethal skills, Mr. War is ready to climb back to the top… and make his enemies pay.

title: Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound
summary:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

title: The Duke’s Obsession with His Wife
summary: No summary available.

title: White Moon He Made a Move On Me
summary: A sassy, drop-dead gorgeous heiress clashes with the refined, high-and-mighty CEO, Mr. Bao Jinlan. Jiang Yaoyao had a secret crush on Bao Jinlan for ages, being super cautious and discreet about it, until one day, she woke up in a hotel room with him sleeping right next to her... And then, she somehow became Bao Jinlan's fiancée. Nobody dared to mess with her in the Jiang family anymore, and the big shots in the city's social scene respected her to no end. Everywhere she went, the youngsters would call her 'Big Sis,' and Mr. Bao? Well, he suddenly got addicted to being around her.

title: Tyrano Noh Kyung-soo
Lord of Summons! Sudden Mutation
